TopTrumpsApp

Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • TopTrumpsApp.Card
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Card
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    An instantiable class which defines a Card. This class contains a method assigning each stat its own index value so that it may be accessed when the corresponding button is clicked during a Game.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Card

        public Card(java.lang.String name,
            int attack,
            int defence,
            int height,
            int caps,
            int goals,
            int trophies,
            int rating,
            javax.swing.ImageIcon icon)
        Card 9-argument constructor. Calls the 9 mutators and setCardNumber() method to initialise the attributes of a Card object. The Card ID is set internally using the value of a count attribute called cardID to ensure unique Card ID values.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the card
        attack - the attack rating of the card
        defence - the defence rating of the card
        height - the height rating of the card
        caps - the caps rating of the card
        goals - the goals rating of the card
        trophies - the trophies rating of the card
        rating - the overall rating of the card
        icon - the associated image of the card

      • Card

        public Card(java.lang.String name,
            int attack,
            int defence,
            int height,
            int caps,
            int goals,
            int trophies,
            int rating)
        Card 8-argument constructor used for the creation of user-defined cards. Calls the 8 mutators setCardNumber() method to initialise the attributes of a Card object with user supplied values. The Card ID is set internally using the value of a count attribute called cardID to ensure unique Card ID values.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the card
        attack - the attack rating of the card
        defence - the defence rating of the card
        height - the height rating of the card
        caps - the caps rating of the card
        goals - the goals rating of the card
        trophies - the trophies rating of the card
        rating - the overall rating of the card

      • getValueAtIndex

        public int getValueAtIndex(int index)
        Method to get the value of a certain stat based on the index number passed into the method. Each stat is assigned it's own "index" value so that if it is selected in the game it may be returned for comparison via this method
        Parameters:
        index - the index value of the accessor
        Returns:
        an Integer value containing the selected stat's value
